message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think a 60-40 split is fairer, reflecting my willingness to take the lead in this negotiation. Let's see if you agree.
Not so fast, Bob! I think you're trying to take advantage of the inflation. I'd like to propose a compromise.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to meet you halfway. But I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of proposing first.
